about_the_game:
This new game developed by the audacious, charismatic, sensational, breathtaking, agile, wonderful, reckless, fantastic and single Capucine Mahieux seriously promises to revolutionize the History of pony games in its entirety, thus creating a before and after of an absolutely insane magnitude.

Go in this Point and Click Visual Novel of horse riding in search of unicorns in the charming town of Saint Amand les Eaux!!!!

Unfortunately, your belongings were lost during the trip.. that's where THE PONY comes in!!!!!!

Take care of your equine friend, train him and participate in competitions in order to restock your money and equipment.

Several inhabitants are to be met in Saint Amand les Eaux, including very handsome and attractive boys OMG. O_O

"A true French masterpiece"

- Someone

"If there is one thing in this world that needs to be preserved, it is neither biodiversity, nor values, nor even oxygen, but rather the works of this insanely talented developer."

- A guy in my cellar
